about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Silly Monks Entertainment Ltd is Hyderabad based Entertainment & Media Company with main focus in Digital Media Publishing. Company publishes the digital content on various platforms such as YouTube, Facebook, Amazon, Vuclip etc.

The contents that are being published are either created by the company or acquired through outright purchase or through syndicated method. In case of content which is bought by the company, company own the copy rights of the content through an agreement with assignor and hence the publishing revenue is fully accrued to us. When the content is through syndication, company share the revenue with the content partner.


The company is also engaged in movie/content production, celebrity’s social media management, App development, Audio content Distribution, Google Ad word and online / digital Advertising, event management, and live band performances.

Silly Monks Entertainment is growing its focus in movie production; wherein company has co-produced Telugu Movies named Oohalu Gusagusalade, Dikkulu Choodaku Ramayya & Tungabhadra with Vaaraahi Chalana Chitram. Company is also planning to venture into the Hindi Film industry through a co-produced venture 'The Great Indian Escape' with KIK Butt Entertainment.

contactDetails.full_address: Silly Monks Entertainment Ltd, 301 Ektha Pearl 2-17-89, B P Raju Marg Kothaguda, Kondapur

faqs.question: What is the Silly Monks IPO?
faqs.answer:
Silly Monks IPO is a SME IPO of 1260000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹15.12 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹120 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on January 5, 2018, and closes on January 10, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Silly Monks IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Silly Monks IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Silly Monks IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Silly Monks IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Silly Monks IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Silly Monks IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Silly Monks IPO opens on January 5, 2018 and closes on January 10, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Silly Monks IPO?
faqs.answer: Silly Monks IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,44,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Silly Monks IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Silly Monks IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
